languages.text: {n}Арбитр недовольно прищуривается.{/n} "Глупая ошибка. Я работал в кают-компании на выделенном мне месте и банально забыл инфопластину, а Глейто — опознал его как мою важную собственность, потому перешел в режим охраны. И начал отгонять всех, кто мог на него посягнуть".

{n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр недовольно прищуривается.{/n} "Глупая ошибка. Я работал в кают-компании на выделенном мне месте и банально забыл инфопластину, а Глейто — опознал его как мою важную собственность, потому перешел в режим охраны. И начал отгонять всех, кто мог на него посягнуть".

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working in my assigned cubicle in the officers' quarters and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

{n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working in my assigned cubicle in the officers' quarters and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

{n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

{n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは顔をしかめた。{/n}「愚かなミスでした。私は士官室の自分に割り当てられた机で作業していのですが、バカなことに、データスレートをそこに置き忘れてしまったんです。グライトは私の大事な持ち物だと認識して、警戒モードに入りました。それで、近づこうとする者を追い払おうとし始めたんです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは顔をしかめた。{/n}「愚かなミスでした。私は士官室の自分に割り当てられた机で作業していのですが、バカなことに、データスレートをそこに置き忘れてしまったんです。グライトは私の大事な持ち物だと認識して、警戒モードに入りました。それで、近づこうとする者を追い払おうとし始めたんです」

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Ein dummer Fehler. Ich hatte an meinem zugewiesenen Tisch in der Offiziersmesse gearbeitet und wie ein Idiot meinen Datablock dort liegen lassen. Glaito erkannte ihn als wichtigen Gegenstand in meinem Besitz und ging darum in den Bewachungsmodus – und vertrieb jeden der sich näherte."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomornes Blick verfinstert sich.{/n} "Ein dummer Fehler. Ich hatte an meinem zugewiesenen Tisch in der Offiziersmesse gearbeitet und wie ein Idiot meinen Datablock dort liegen lassen. Glaito erkannte ihn als wichtigen Gegenstand in meinem Besitz und ging darum in den Bewachungsmodus – und vertrieb jeden der sich näherte."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se renfrogne.{/n} « Une erreur stupide, voilà tout. Je travaillais à mon bureau dans le carré des officiers, et j'y ai bêtement laissé ma plaque de données. Glaito l'a reconnue comme un instrument important m'appartenant et il est passé en mode garde, chassant quiconque risquerait de mettre la main dessus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se renfrogne.{/n} « Une erreur stupide, voilà tout. Je travaillais à mon bureau dans le carré des officiers, et j'y ai bêtement laissé ma plaque de données. Glaito l'a reconnue comme un instrument important m'appartenant et il est passé en mode garde, chassant quiconque risquerait de mettre la main dessus. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne frunce el ceño.{/n} «Fue un error estúpido. Estuve trabajando en el puesto que me asignaron en la sala de oficiales y, como un idiota, me dejé mi tablilla de datos allí. Glaito la reconoció y, sabiendo que era muy importante para mí, activó el modo perro guardián para disuadir a cualquiera que se acercase a ella».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne frunce el ceño.{/n} «Fue un error estúpido. Estuve trabajando en el puesto que me asignaron en la sala de oficiales y, como un idiota, me dejé mi tablilla de datos allí. Glaito la reconoció y, sabiendo que era muy importante para mí, activó el modo perro guardián para disuadir a cualquiera que se acercase a ella».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙皱了皱眉。{/n}“那是个愚蠢的错误。我一直都在军官室固定的桌子上处理事情，但我却犯了蠢，把数据板落在那里了。格雷托认出了那是我的重要物品，于是进入了戒备状态，赶走了一切可能会擅自查看它的人。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙皱了皱眉。{/n}“那是个愚蠢的错误。我一直都在军官室固定的桌子上处理事情，但我却犯了蠢，把数据板落在那里了。格雷托认出了那是我的重要物品，于是进入了戒备状态，赶走了一切可能会擅自查看它的人。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne suratını buruşturuyor.{/n} "Ahmakça bir gaflet. Subay salonunda çalışırken databelayı orada unuttum. Glaito, bunun bana ait mühim bir eşya olduğunu sezince korumaya geçip kimseleri yaklaştırmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne scowls.{/n} "A foolish mistake. I had been working at my assigned desk in the wardroom and, like an idiot, I left my data-slate in there. Glaito recognised it as an important item belonging to me, so he went into guard mode — and started chasing off anyone who might encroach upon it."
